revised_title: Examination and Properties of Rubia munjista and Munjeet Dye
tldr: The author examines the properties and composition of Rubia munjista, also known as East-Indian Madder or Munjeet, and its dye properties. They discover that munjeet contains less colorant than other madder varieties and that the colorant in munjeet is not as durable. The author also discusses the synthesis of new colorants, such as purpurine, and their properties.
